data.eml:eml: A new species of Adelophryne (Anura: Eleutherodactylidae) from Guyana, with additional data on A. gutturosa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Macculloch, Ross D., Lathrop, Amy, Kok, Philippe J. R., Minter, Leslie R., Khan, Samir Z., Barrio-Amorós, César L. (2008): A new species of Adelophryne (Anura: Eleutherodactylidae) from Guyana, with additional data on A. gutturosa. Zootaxa 1884: 36-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274492
